      • handleBtn

        public boolean handleBtn(int CenterX,
                         int YCoord,
                         int BtnHeight)
        Checks user mouse click to know which button it wanted to press
        Parameters:
        CenterX - x coordinate so that the button image is drawn in the center
        YCoord - button image y coordinate
        BtnHeight - height of the button image

        Returns:

        Checks user mouse click to know if the user pressed the share to facebook button
        Parameters:
        facebookXCoord - facebook share image x coordinate to be drawn
        facebookYCoord - facebook share image y coordinate to be drawn
        facebookBtnWidth - width of the facebook button image
        facebookBtnHeight - height of the facebook button image
